body:
Hi guys im doing a project at school.
Im just gonna try get some of your opinions about this. So how do you think video games has affected modern society


Thanks
- Da_Baus
body_tagged:
Hi guys im doing a project at school.
Im just gonna try get some of your opinions about this. So how do you think video games has affected modern society


Thanks
- Da_Baus
title: How has gaming affected modern society?

replies.body:
video games have affected people by:
bad eyesight
but it is proven that playing first person shooter games could gain the persons reflexes
replies.body_tagged:
video games have affected people by:
bad eyesight
but it is proven that playing first person shooter games could gain the persons reflexes

replies.body:
I believe that video gaming has had a profound impact on children, children who spend time playing 1st person shooter games have shown that they gain better reflexes, and greater vision.
Though too much for children can lead to problems in the eye pigments...
Gaming industries gain millions of dollars of year from people buying such video games.
Some of the biggest of which include
-Sony
-Microsoft
-CAPCOM
-Hal
-Rare
-GameFreak
-Nintendo
-Mojang :3

Videogame mascots have become icons in modern society, being recognized by a large majority of western culture.

:-}

replies.body:
I think the title should be changed to How has gaming effected modern society 
-BUMP to help you with your work :/
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Pros: Has greatly increased peoples peripheral vision and eye co-ordination, great time filler.

Cons: Can cause people to become violent / rage, can cause seizures, will start to make people anti social depending on what they play.

May have missed some but this is all I can think of on the top of my head, if you would like to suggest anything by all means, do so.

replies.body: how do i add you as a friend?
replies.body_tagged: how do i add you as a friend?

replies.body: Lots of people become addicted to them (mostly due to having high addiction rates) and spend too much time on them. This may decrease your grades/friends. Although it would be better if none of us played video games, they are a great source of easy entertainment and time-filling, as Cupcake said. If you're keeping social and having good grades, with your video games constantly as second-priority, then good job and keep at it!
replies.body_tagged: Lots of people become addicted to them (mostly due to having high addiction rates) and spend too much time on them. This may decrease your grades/friends. Although it would be better if none of us played video games, they are a great source of easy entertainment and time-filling, as Cupcake said. If you're keeping social and having good grades, with your video games constantly as second-priority, then good job and keep at it!

replies.body: Society has changed very little as a result of gaming.
